# AnnotationPosition

**Structure**

The position of an annotation.

## Declaration

```swift
struct AnnotationPosition
```

## Type Properties

- **automatic**: Place the annotation automatically.
- **bottom**: Place the annotation on the bottom of the item.
- **bottomLeading**: Place the annotation on the bottom leading corner of the item.
- **bottomTrailing**: Place the annotation on the bottom trailing corner of the item.
- **leading**: Place the annotation on the leading edge of the item.
- **overlay**: Place the annotation as an overlay of the item.
- **top**: Place the annotation on the top of the item.
- **topLeading**: Place the annotation on the top leading corner of the item.
- **topTrailing**: Place the annotation on the top trailing corner of the item.
- **trailing**: Place the annotation on the trailing edge of the item.

## Annotations

- **AnnotationContext**: Information about an item that you add an annotation to.
- **AnnotationOverflowResolution**

## Conforms To

- Equatable
